meanings.sent1: The resumers of the game after the break showed great determination.

meanings.definition: A document summarizing a person's work experience and qualifications.
meanings.sent1: The resumers submitted their CVs for the job application.
meanings.sent2: The resumers were well-prepared with their resumes for the interview.
meanings.sent3: The resumers accidentally attached the wrong document to their application.
meanings.sent4: The resumers' resumes shone brightly among the other applicants.
meanings.sent5: The resumers' resumes highlighted their skills and achievements effectively.
